original: Öhrn, Eber Vilihellm;, apotekare, Fal-köpimg, f. 7/7/95 i Jönköp. av Vilhelm Ö. o. Josefina Bergbom. G. 21 m. Ro’sa Linnéa Sjöstrand. Barn: Åke f. 27. — Stud:ex. i Vänersb. 14, farm, kand. 17, apot:ex. 21. Elev v. apot. i Vänersb. 14-16, anst. i Skövde o. Alingsås 21-3’7, förest, åtta mån., priv. à apot. i Delsbo 37, transp. t. apot. Svalan i Falköp. 43’. Styr :led. i Gävle -Dala krets av Sv. apot:förb. 40, full-m:’suppl. s. å., fullm. 41. En av stift, av Sv. kristl. farmifören. o. dess sekr. Kommifullm. i Delsbo 38. Led. av nyk-terh :nd i Falköp. sed. 45.
translated: Öhrn, Eber Vilihellm;, pharmacist, Falköping, born on 7/7/95 in Jönköping, son of Vilhelm Ö. and Josefina Bergbom. Married on 21 to Ro’sa Linnéa Sjöstrand. Children: Åke, born in 1927. Completed studentexamen in Vänersborg in 1914, graduated with a Bachelor of Pharmacy in 1917, received pharmacy license in 1921. Apprenticed at a pharmacy in Vänersborg from 1914-1916, employed in Skövde and Alingsås from 1921-1937, served as a supervisor for eight months, own private pharmacy in Delsbo in 1937, transferred to the Svalan pharmacy in Falköping in 1943. Member of the board in the Gävle-Dala district of the Swedish Pharmacists Association in 1940, became a full member in the same year, and secretary in 1941. Also a member of the Swedish Christian Pharmacists Association and served as its secretary. Appointed as a deputy commissioner in Delsbo in 1938. Member of the temperance council in Falköping since 1945.

memberOf.name: Gävle-Dala District of the Swedish Pharmacists Association
